scripts.backup: echo "backing up db..." && /Applications/XAMPP/xamppfiles/bin/mysqldump -u root -p vendure > ./sql-backup/vendure.sql && exit 1
scripts.restore: echo "restoring db..." && /Applications/XAMPP/xamppfiles/bin/mysql â€“ u root -p vendure < ./sql-backup/vendure.sql  && exit 1
scripts.commit: echo "Commit changes"  && echo "Adding files..." && git add . && echo "Commiting files..." && git commit -m 'new commit' && echo "Push changes..." && git push origin dev --force && exit 1
